name: Touken Ranbu Warriors - Honmaru Backdrop 5-piece Set
detailed_description:
A set that allows you to obtain at a discount all 5 varieties of Honmaru Backdrop options.

Content:
- Honmaru Backdrop "Sakura Viewing"
- Honmaru Backdrop "Sakura Viewing - Nighttime"
- Honmaru Backdrop "Rainy Season"
- Honmaru Backdrop "Autumn Leaves"
- Honmaru Backdrop "Snow Viewing"

How to use:
Select "Settings" - "DLC Settings" - "Change Backdrop" from Honmaru.

Notes:
Under certain conditions, changes made to your honmaru backdrop will not be applied.
There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Each of the DLC items included in this content is the same as the respective item available for individual purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
To use the content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.

short_description: All 5 varieties of Honmaru Backdrop are added.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
